commit message:
Install Android Support Repository when installing from CLI

Fixes #400, error message:

Could not resolve all dependencies for configuration ':libtermexec:_debugCompile'.
Allow hiding of Material Design ActionBar

Merge pull request #413 from jspricke/fix_install-sdk-packages

Install Android Support Repository when installing from CLI

Merge pull request #414 from jspricke/hide_material_design_action_bar

Allow hiding of Material Design ActionBar
Install current sdk packages when installing on CLI
Use android-sdk-manager plugin to automate downloading Android SDK components.

Eliminated maddening code duplication in Term.

Fixes failure to display title of BoundTermSession. Fixes issues
with closing windows, created via AIDL

Moved most stuff out of Exec to allow proper handling of pty ioctl failures.

Moved all devpts-centered logic to GenericTermSession. Moved process
group hangup to ShellTermSession. Throw exceptions from pty-related
methods during initialization of BoundSession.
Fix crashing on android wear

Merge pull request #417 from jspricke/fix_install-sdk-packages2

Install current sdk packages when installing on CLI

Merge pull request #420 from sssemil/patch-1

Fix crashing on android wear

Fixed an issue with UTF-8 ioctl 'failing'

The exercise of finding out, which ioctl was triggered and why was it 'failing'
is left up to the reader
Start work on Android TV support

Android TV / HDMI output safe margins preferences.

Should be on by default if the ui mode is a TV , but not tested
Chenge margin update position in updatePrefs for a more logical flow
check for null
Use padding instead of margins
Change margins
More than level of parent for padding calculation
